title: Signature files do not show up on --snapshot or --skip-publish
body:
**Describe the bug**

I've hacked `signs:` section to create  `${artifact}.sha256` files for each artifact I have. I run `goreleaser`, it computes the signature correctly, however it doesn't save it to `dist/`

**To Reproduce**

Have this in your config:

```yaml
signs:
  - artifacts: all
    signature: "${artifact}.sha256"
    cmd: sh
    args: ["-c", 'sha256sum ${artifact} | cut -d " " -f 1']
```


Run `goreleaser --snapshot` or `goreleaser --skip-verify --skip-publish`. 

Observe signing happens and results are printed to the screen.


**Expected behavior**

I expect calculated signature files to be saved to dist/ after running:

but they aren't saved there or anywhere as far as I can tell.

**Environment (please complete the following information):**

- OS: mac
- OS version: Darwin REDACTED 19.0.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.0.0: Thu Oct 17 16:17:15 PDT 2019; root:xnu-6153.41.3~29/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64 i386 MacBookPro15,3 Darwin
- GoReleaser Version 0.124.1

**Additional context**

See output of `--skip-publish` successfully calculating signatures

```
   • CALCULATING CHECKSUMS
      • checksumming              file=krew-darwin_amd64.tar.gz
      • checksumming              file=krew-linux_arm.tar.gz
      • checksumming              file=krew-linux_amd64.tar.gz
      • checksumming              file=krew-windows_amd64.zip
   • SIGNING ARTIFACTS
      • signing                   cmd=[sh -c sha256sum dist/krew-windows_amd64.zip | cut -d " " -f 1]
      • 787ac8a757409a2af7ec10da076ad651d4b951a4624189353d3b7967542ef61b
 cmd=sh
      • signing                   cmd=[sh -c sha256sum dist/krew-linux_arm.tar.gz | cut -d " " -f 1]
      • 105ce8112290ed294a220fbafce89ecdbb5d2a3959dd4c8f974b767da91db9db
 cmd=sh
      • signing                   cmd=[sh -c sha256sum dist/krew-linux_amd64.tar.gz | cut -d " " -f 1]
      • 87c163295998c09ea2ea403e87afd361e78dda9237357c9e9b50639044ce0d11
 cmd=sh
      • signing                   cmd=[sh -c sha256sum dist/krew-darwin_amd64.tar.gz | cut -d " " -f 1]
      • f91507798039b3b5e59dc4c78627236a0a7a3336691d5aa64a998b283a8043ac
 cmd=sh
      • signing                   cmd=[sh -c sha256sum dist/checksums.txt | cut -d " " -f 1]
      • ac5baa8b79b835d74bc6a2cc89aa2b15ece71dc0d837fb0e9e386dacde81050d
 cmd=sh
```

However, the resulting files are not in `./dist`

```
$ tree dist
dist
├── checksums.txt
├── config.yaml
├── krew-darwin_amd64.tar.gz
├── krew-linux_amd64.tar.gz
├── krew-linux_arm.tar.gz
├── krew-windows_amd64.zip
├── krew_darwin_amd64
│   └── krew
├── krew_linux_amd64
│   └── krew
├── krew_linux_arm_6
│   └── krew
└── krew_windows_amd64
    └── krew.exe

4 directories, 10 files
```
